49.ara-name: كتاب المناقب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali bin Husain:from his father, from his grandfather, 'Ali bin Abi Talib: "The Prophet (ﷺ) took Hasan and Husain by the hand and said: 'Whoever loves me and loves these two, and their father and mother, he shall be with me in my level on the Day of Judgement
